Body: I have a Htc Evo 3D, whose capacitive buttons stopped working. I've seen on google play there are apps (button saviour, virtual button, handy soft keys) , which would move the 4 main buttons (home, settings, search, back) to screen, but they all require root or/and Android >=4.1.Can someone point me to an app which would suit to the criteria in the title (non-root and Android 4.0.3)?
Title: App like "button savior" but for non-root and Android 4.0.3

history.Text: I have a Htc Evo 3D, whose capacitive buttons stopped working. I've seen on google play there are apps ([button saviour][1], [virtual button][2], [handy soft keys][3]) , which would move the 4 main buttons (home, settings, search, back) to screen, but they all require root or/and Android >=4.1.Can someone point me to an app which would suit to the criteria in the title (non-root and Android 4.0.3)?  [1]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.smart.swkey.nonroot&hl=en  [2]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.ne.neko.freewing.VirtualButton&hl=en  [3]: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ca.yesoft.handysoftkeys&hl=en
App like "button savior" but for non-root and Android 4.0.3
